experience.title: Graduate Engineer Trainee Intern
experience.description: •Rock Physics analysis in the CB-OS/2 block of the Cambay basin and understanding of rock property trends.•Identification of the extent of hydrocarbon-bearing reservoirs and their connectivity. •Understanding the effects of saturation porosity, and clay content on elastic properties.•Generating Rock Physics template for CB-OS/2 reservoirs considering the fluid substitution and cross plots between petrophysical and elastic properties.•AVO modeling and synthetic gather analysis for in-situ and fluid-substituted data.
experience.description_html: •Rock Physics analysis in the CB-OS/2 block of the Cambay basin and understanding of rock property trends.•Identification of the extent of hydrocarbon-bearing reservoirs and their connectivity. •Understanding the effects of saturation porosity, and clay content on elastic properties.•Generating Rock Physics template for CB-OS/2 reservoirs considering the fluid substitution and cross plots between petrophysical and elastic properties.•AVO modeling and synthetic gather analysis for in-situ and fluid-substituted data.

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: •Managed projects in various areas by planning, implementing, establishing KPIs, and following up with various teams (Tech / Sales, etc.)•Developed a feedback loop to ensure a constantly improving experience for users and also implemented a product-led referral system.•Developed a digital health platform that recommended personalized exercise plans to users based on their health data and preferences.
experience.description_html: •Managed projects in various areas by planning, implementing, establishing KPIs, and following up with various teams (Tech / Sales, etc.)•Developed a feedback loop to ensure a constantly improving experience for users and also implemented a product-led referral system.•Developed a digital health platform that recommended personalized exercise plans to users based on their health data and preferences. <!---->

experience.title: Associate Research Fellow
experience.description: •Worked on “Offshore Enhanced Oil Recovery through CO2 Sequestration” under Scientist Dr. Subhashree Mishra.•Carried out research on the different types of enhanced oil recoveries (EOR) and overview of CO2-EOR projects in the world.•Prepared a report suggesting different oil-field locations where the EOR project can be carried out for a 20-40% increase in production.
experience.description_html: •Worked on “Offshore Enhanced Oil Recovery through CO2 Sequestration” under Scientist Dr. Subhashree Mishra.•Carried out research on the different types of enhanced oil recoveries (EOR) and overview of CO2-EOR projects in the world.•Prepared a report suggesting different oil-field locations where the EOR project can be carried out for a 20-40% increase in production. <!---->

education.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
education.description: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur (Techno-Management Fest) || (Sep 2019 - Apr 2020 ) •Coordinated with a team of 48 members to organize the 17th edition of Kshitij, the techno-management symposium of IIT Kharagpur. •Oversaw the publicity in the region of Bihar, Jharkhand, and Odisha and increased the participation by approx. 150% from the region. Core team member - Earth Sciences Study Circle (ESSC) || (May 2021- Feb 2024) •Responsible for conducting various events and working on… Show more
